# Request for Proposal - Telemetry Tower & Galvanization at Mount Revelstoke National Park

**Notice ID and Solicitation Details**

* **Solicitation ID**: 5P468-23-0074/A
* **Notice Release Date**: June 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: July 19, 2023, 4:00 PM MDT

**Project Description**

Parks Canada is soliciting a proposal from qualified contractors for the fabrication and installation of a weather tower at Mount Revelstoke National Park, British Columbia. The tower will enable the Avalanche Control Services team to better understand the snowpack in the region, ensuring the safety of travelers on the Trans-Canada Highway.

In addition to the new tower, the project also involves the removal of rust from an existing tower in the Rogers Pass Compound and the application of a suitable primer.

**Contract Scope and Requirements**

* Fabrication and installation of a weather tower at Mount Revelstoke National Park
* Removal of rust from an existing tower in the Rogers Pass Compound
* Application of a suitable primer on the existing tower
* Site access by helicopter and utilization of the designated helicopter staging area

**Tendering Process**

This solicitation is the second stage of a two-stage process, having previously evaluated the qualifications of interested suppliers. Qualified suppliers have been invited to submit a financial bid on the project based on the provided specifications and drawings.

**Contracting Entity Details**

* **Procuring Entity**: Parks Canada
* **Procuring Entity Representative**: Jen Maheu (jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca, 587-432-8458)

**Notice and Proposal Submission**

* Notice URL: N/A
* Proposal submission deadline: July 19, 2023, 4:00 PM MDT
* Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
